text: Advertisement Gwyneth Paltrow proved on Sunday that her intense workouts with personal trainer Tracy Anderson continue to pay off as she looked incredible in a small black bikini. The GOOP founder was toned to perfection as she took a swim and then relaxed on a luxurious yacht owned by Italian fashion designer Valentino off the coast of Capri, Italy. The Oscar - winning actress, 45, has been on a dream vacation with her TV producer fiance Brad Falchuk, 47, of Glee and Pose fame.
